app.title: QSL Card Generator
app.subtitle: Create personalized QSL cards for your contacts
app.footer: QSL Card Generator for Amateur Radio Operators

demo.demoDescription: Try the QSL Card Generator without registration

imprint.title: Imprint (Impressum)
imprint.name: Name
imprint.disputeResolutionText1: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
imprint.disputeResolutionText2: We are not obligated or willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprint.copyrightText1: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to Austrian copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.
imprint.copyrightText2: The QSL cards generated by users remain the intellectual property of the respective callsign owners.
imprint.liabilityForLinksText1: Our website may contain links to external websites of third parties, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content of those pages.
imprint.liabilityForLinksText2: The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. No illegal content was recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete indications of a legal violation.
imprint.thirdPartyContentText: If you believe that any content on this website infringes your copyright or other rights, please contact us at the email address provided above. We will investigate and remove any infringing content promptly upon verification.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy (Datenschutzerklärung)
privacy.overviewText: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.accountDataText: When you create an account, we collect:
privacy.accountDataPassword: Password - Stored securely using bcrypt hashing (we never store plain passwords)
privacy.qslCardDataText: When you generate QSL cards, we process:
privacy.qslCardDataItem1: Card templates and background images you upload
privacy.qslCardDataItem3: Generated card data (processed in your browser, not stored on our servers)
privacy.qslCardDataNote: Note: QSL cards are generated entirely in your browser using HTML5 Canvas. The actual card content (recipient callsign, date, frequency, etc.) is not transmitted to or stored on our servers.
privacy.autoCollectedDataText: When you visit our website, the following data may be collected automatically:
privacy.autoCollectedDataItem1: IP address (may be anonymized by Cloudflare)
privacy.autoCollectedDataItem5: Referrer URL (the page you came from)
privacy.cloudflareImportant: Important: This website uses Cloudflare as a Content Delivery Network (CDN) and security service.
privacy.cloudflareText: Cloudflare, Inc. is a US-based company that provides CDN, DDoS protection, and security services. When you access our website, your connection passes through Cloudflare's network.
privacy.cloudflareDataItem3: Security-related information (to detect and prevent attacks)
privacy.cloudflareCdn: Caches and delivers static content from servers closer to you
privacy.cloudflareDdosDesc: Protects our service from distributed denial-of-service attacks
privacy.cloudflareSsl: Encrypts data in transit between you and our servers
privacy.cloudflareSecurityDesc: Blocks malicious traffic and bot attacks
privacy.cloudflarePolicy: Cloudflare processes data according to their privacy policy: https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/
privacy.cloudflareCertified: Cloudflare is certified under the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework.
privacy.legalBasisText: We process your data based on:
privacy.legalBasisContract: Contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) - To provide our QSL card generation service
privacy.legalBasisLegitimate: Legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR) - For security, fraud prevention, and service improvement
privacy.legalBasisConsent: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) - Where you have explicitly agreed
privacy.cookiesText: This website uses only essential cookies required for the service to function:
privacy.cookiesAuthToken: Authentication token - Stored in localStorage to keep you logged in
privacy.cookiesLangPref: Language preference - Stored in localStorage to remember your language choice
privacy.uploadedImagesRetention: Until you delete them or your account is removed
privacy.gdprRightsText: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.gdprRightAccess: Right of access (Art. 15) - Request a copy of your data
privacy.gdprRightErasure: Right to erasure (Art. 17) - Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.gdprRightRestriction: Right to restriction (Art. 18) - Limit how we process your data
privacy.gdprRightPortability: Right to data portability (Art. 20) - Receive your data in a portable format
privacy.gdprRightObject: Right to object (Art. 21) - Object to processing based on legitimate interests
privacy.gdprContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at oe8yml@oevsv.at.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
privacy.securityItem1: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt with 12 salt rounds
privacy.securityItem2: All data is transmitted over HTTPS/TLS encryption
privacy.securityItem5: Card images are only accessible to authenticated users
privacy.internationalTransfersText: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA) through our use of Cloudflare. Cloudflare participates in the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework, which provides adequate protection for personal data transferred from the EU to the US.
privacy.complaintsText: If you believe that your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. In Austria, the competent authority is:
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page with the "Last updated" date at the top. Significant changes will be communicated to registered users.
